title: An Act ensuring the appropriate and timely payment and residential service placement for children deemed to be a safety risk

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Howitt of Seekonk, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 248) of Steven S. Howitt relative to at-risk children and their proper placement and establishing a special commission (including members of the General Court) to make an investigation of such placements.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/22/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
